2025-10-01.breakfast: Rise and shine! For breakfast, you can enjoy a sweet cinnamon swirl, or a big bowl of honey Cheerios cereal. Served with fresh fruit and your choice of milk.
2025-10-01.lunch: Here’s what’s cooking for lunch! Spaghetti and meatballs with a warm dinner roll! Other choices include chef salads, or a grilled cheese sandwich for grades six through twelve. On the side, enjoy fresh baby carrots with ranch, green beans for grades six through twelve, plus fruit and milk choices.

2025-10-02.breakfast: Good morning! Today’s breakfast is a pack of chocolate doughnuts, or a fudge poptart pack. Served with fruit and milk choices.
2025-10-02.lunch: It’s pizza day! Choose from pizza favorites, or have a turkey sandwich or turkey and cheese. Sides include golden corn, a marinara dipping cup, fruit, and milk choices.

2025-10-03.breakfast: Happy Friday! Start your day with a tasty chicken biscuit, or a big bowl of cinnamon toast cereal. Served with fruit and milk choices.
2025-10-03.lunch: Friday lunch is juicy hamburgers or cheeseburgers, plus turkey sandwich or turkey and cheese. On the side, enjoy baked beans, lettuce and tomato toppings for grades six through twelve, fresh fruit, and milk choices.

2025-10-06.breakfast: Good morning! Today’s breakfast is sweet blueberry bread, or a big bowl of cinnamon toast cereal. Served with fruit and milk choices.
2025-10-06.lunch: Lunchtime looks yummy! Enjoy boneless chicken bites with a roll for grades six through twelve, BBQ chicken bites with a roll also for grades six through twelve, or popcorn chicken for kindergarten through fifth. Other choices include chef salads, or ham sandwich and ham and cheese for grades six through twelve. Sides are steamed broccoli, crunchy celery sticks for grades six through twelve, plus fruit and milk choices.

2025-10-08.breakfast: Rise and shine! For breakfast, enjoy mini maple pancakes, or a big bowl of honey Cheerios cereal. Served with fruit and milk choices.
2025-10-08.lunch: Today’s lunch is Salisbury steak with a warm dinner roll. Other choices are chef salads, or a grilled cheese sandwich for grades six through twelve. Sides include corn for grades six through twelve, steamed carrots, fruit, milk choices, and even ice cream!

2025-10-09.breakfast: Good morning! Today’s breakfast is mini powdered doughnut holes, or a fudge poptart pack. Served with fruit and milk choices.
2025-10-09.lunch: Let’s dig in to lunch! Signature macaroni and cheese with a warm garlic breadstick. You can also have a turkey sandwich or turkey and cheese. On the side, green beans, marinara sauce, fresh fruit, and milk choices.

2025-10-10.breakfast: It’s Friday! Start the day with a country steak biscuit, or a big bowl of cinnamon toast cereal. Served with fruit and milk choices.
2025-10-10.lunch: Friday lunch is here! Regular or spicy chicken sandwich, or a turkey sandwich or turkey and cheese. Sides include crispy french fries, lettuce and tomato toppings for grades six through twelve, fruit, and milk choices.

2025-10-20.breakfast: Good morning! For breakfast, enjoy cocoa bread, or a big bowl of cinnamon toast cereal. Served with fruit and milk choices.
2025-10-20.lunch: Lunch is packed with flavor today! Mandarin orange chicken, turkey and cheese sandwich for kindergarten through fifth, or ham sandwich and ham and cheese for grades six through twelve. Sides include lo mein noodles, steamed broccoli, dragon punch drink for grades six through twelve, fruit, and milk choices.

2025-10-21.breakfast: Rise and shine! Enjoy a chicken sausage croissant, or a fudge poptart pack. Served with crispy tator tots, fruit, and milk choices.
